synonyms.synonym: Plasmin heavy chain A, short form

protein.specific_function: Angiostatin is an angiogenesis inhibitor that blocks neovascularization and growth of experimental primary and metastatic tumors in vivo

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides
